name: Magnesio
short_description:
Magnesio is an AS3 framework to help you to do common tasks faster. This framework include utilities designed for game and web development.

This framework can be used in AS3 projects and conventional Flash Files (fla). Magnesio will help you to avoid stomachache and headache in your normal day of work.

Magnesio include support for:

-multilanguage applications.
-simple mvc architecture
-sql-lite scripting
-load: images, texts, sounds in the same way and very easy.
-Advanced Date calculations, countdowns, date conversions.
-Common Math calculations used in web games
-Simple Tweener (alpha)
-Mouse speed detection

..and more :)
summary: Magnesio is an AS3 framework to help you to do common tasks faster
